actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to provide that any disabled individual who on October 18, 1978, was receiving reimbursement under the Civilian Health and Medical Program of the Uniformed Services for custodial care may continue to receive health benefits under such program, notwithstanding any eligibility of such individual for benefits under part A of title XVIII of the Social Security Act.

summary.text: Allows disabled individuals eligible for custodial care under the CHAMPUS program on October 18, 1978, to continue to receive such care concurrently with hospital insurance benefits provided by Medicare.

titles.title: A bill to provide that any disabled individual who on October 18, 1978, was receiving reimbursement under the Civilian Health and Medical Program of the Uniformed Services for custodial care may continue to receive health benefits under such program, notwithstanding any eligibility of such individual for benefits under part A of title XVIII of the Social Security Act.
